name: The 100 Zombie "Challenge" v3!
description:
Lower the zombie's health by clicking on him. He has 100 health. Kill him to win! He will slowly creep to you as well. Don't let him get you! Edit: In v2 when he reaches 50 health he will throw deadly fireballs at you! Press space to dodge them.

Edit 2: In Hard Mode the zombie is slightly faster and fireballs are thrown more frequently. Can you beat it? I did. You can do it!!!! <3

Edit 3: The boss in Story Mode has the same mechanics! It's still space to duck- but you actually jump.
